entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
